name: WebGIS
desc: Standard web-based GIS application that can be developed into a more useful application in the future..

name: ERP
desc: Open source ERP based on SAP ECC/Hana S/4 and Oracle R12/ Cloud Application

name: QR-Code Plant Scanner
desc: Inventory of plantation commodities using a QR Code Scanner. It must use WebGIS and the Avenza Map application if used in blank spot areas.

name: Barcode Ontrack
desc: Inventory of plantation commodities using barcodes.

name: Sistem Absensi Pegawai
desc: This website contains API Backend and employee data management for SiAP application. This website is built with Laravel, Tailwind CSS, Vue JS, and Inertia JS. This website also has an attendance page (QR Code) and a table to display employee attendance data.

name: Sistem Absensi Pegawai Mobile
desc: Mobile application for employee attendance data management in Balaesang District government offices. This application is built with Flutter.
